author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tagore Nagar office of the Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation, now functioning at 32, Palam Station Road, will be shifted to the Sellur office on the same road with effect from March 2, according to an official press release.

Prizes distributed

Prizes and certificates were distributed to engineering students, who had won in several competitions to mark the Builders’ Day celebration organised by the Madurai centre of the Builders’ Association of India here last week.

Lalchand Sharma, all-India president; Naresh Agarwal, past chairman, Gaziabad centre; A. Puhazhendi, past vice-president, South Zone; N. Raghunathan, State chairman, and K. Arunachalam, Head, Department of Civil Engineering, Thiagarajar College of Engineering, addressed the participants. Selvakumar, chairman, Madurai centre, welcomed. S. Rangaraj, secretary, proposed a vote of thanks.
title: Office to be shifted
